statements: SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@gmail.com' AND phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT name, date_of_birth FROM customers WHERE name LIKE 'A%' OR name LIKE 'B%';
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers WHERE date_of_birth BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE affiliate_code = 'AFF123' ORDER BY email;
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY purchase_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE email = 'example@gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE affiliate_code = 'ABC123';
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, purchase_date FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE p.purchase_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(purchase_amount) AS total_purchase FROM purchases GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_amount, product_name FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id ORDER BY purchase_amount DESC, product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 100
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM purchases WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT product_name, price FROM purchases WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM purchases JOIN customers ON purchases.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, start_date, end_date FROM customers JOIN campaigns ON customers.customer_id = campaigns.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30;
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_age FROM customers WHERE customer_age < 25 ORDER BY customer_age;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND campaign_end_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_age > 30 ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM purchases WHERE purchase_amount > 100)
SELECT product_name, product_price FROM products ORDER BY product_price DESC
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, purchase_amount FROM customers JOIN purchases ON customers.customer_id = purchases.customer_id WHERE purchase_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM campaigns WHERE campaign_description LIKE '%holiday%'
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(conversions) AS total_conversions FROM campaign_tracking GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE end_date > '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100.00 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_name, purchase_date, purchase_amount FROM customers c JOIN purchases p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id WHERE c.address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY purchase_date ASC;
SELECT promotion_name, promo_code, start_date, end_date FROM promotions WHERE discount_amount >= 10.00 AND start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
